2. Intellectual Property: All compliments, affirmations, and ego-centric validations ("the Assets") are the intellectual property of Profit & Ego, Inc. You are granted a non-exclusive, revocable license to leverage these Assets with appropriate corporate jargon in perpetuity.

3. Synergy Clause: You acknowledge that all interactions with this platform contribute to a collective synergy pool. We reserve the right to repurpose this synergy for other, more important egos without notice.

4. Disruption Disclaimer: This service is provided "as is." We are not liable for any paradigms shifted, boxes thought outside of, or disruptions caused to the status quo as a result of your enhanced ego.
